body_html:
No, I built from the github repo (git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch).
I'm pretty sure I followed strictly the instructions from https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source.

I suspect a problem with the cluster installation, but I don't really know what to do at this point.
pytorch installed from conda works like a charm without fasttext

body:
No, I built from the github repo (`git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch`).
I'm pretty sure I followed strictly the instructions from https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source.

I suspect a problem with the cluster installation, but I don't really know what to do at this point. 
pytorch installed from conda works like a charm without fasttext
